item.title: How to Add Custom Fonts to Wordpress with CSS & No Plugins
item.description: This article describes how to add custom fonts to your Wordpress website without the need of using a plugin, all through simple CSS. Don’t worry if this is your first time working with CSS styling language this is a great place to start. Requirements: Wordpress website Custom fonts Step 1: Upload Custom Fonts to a New “Fonts” Folder *It’s reccomended to use a Child Theme when adding font’s and editing the theme style.
